location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morier, Tehran to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that a sum of money drawn for the use of the British Mission to the Court of Persia is no longer needed and may be remitted to the Presidencies in India; it is noted that this refund may be conducted by whatever means best suits the interests of the East India Company.
